{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We colored each of the numbers from
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1, 2, 3, \dots, 32, 33"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
We used "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" colors, and each color was used for exactly "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" numbers. Is it possible that for the numbers with the same color ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a<b<c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":")
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b=c"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
is always true?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose it is possible. Then if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are colored the same, then:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y=z"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow x+y+z=2z\equiv 0 \ \mod2"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the sum of numbers with same color is always divisible by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and the sum of the numbers from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"33"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has to be even, but this leads to controversy, because:
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+2+3+\dots+33=\dfrac{33*34}{2}=33*17\equiv1 \ \mod2"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y+z=2196"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt [ 3 ]{ x } +y+z=2076"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+\sqrt [ 3 ]{ y } +z=1860"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y+\sqrt [ 3 ]{ z } =480"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"and if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive integers,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{ x }^{ \frac { 2 }{ 3 }  }+{ y }^{ \frac { 2 }{ 3 }  }+{ z }^{ \frac { 2 }{ 3 }  }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt [ 3 ]{ x } +y+z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+\sqrt [ 3 ]{ y } +z"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x+y+\sqrt [ 3 ]{ z } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" give us integer answer."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\Rightarrow"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt [3]{x}=a"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt [3]{y}=b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt [3]{z}=c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we can rewrite the question to"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^3+b^3+c^3 = 2196"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"--------(1)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a+b^3+c^3 = 2076"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-------(2)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^3+b+c^3 = 1860"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-------(3)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^3+b^3+c =480"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"-------(4)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1) - (2) , we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a^3-a=120"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Factorizes both size of the equation, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a(a-1)(a+1) = 2^3 \times 3 \times 5\\a(a+1)(a-1)=4 \times 5 \times 6 \\\boxed{a=5}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We can find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" by the same method."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1) - (3) , we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b^3-b=336"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Factorizes both size of the equation, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b(b-1)(b+1) = 2^4 \times 3 \times 7\\b(b+1)(b-1)=6 \times 7 \times 8 \\\boxed{b=7}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1) - (4) , we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c^3-c=1716"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Factorizes both size of the equation, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"c(c-1)(c+1) = 2^2 \times 3 \times 11 \times 13\\c(c+1)(c-1)=11 \times 12 \times 13 \\\boxed{c=12}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{x}^{\frac {2}{3} }+{ y }^{ \frac {2}{3}}+{ z }^{ \frac{2}{3}}\\=a^2+b^2+c^2\\=5^2+7^2+12^2\\=25+49+144\\=\boxed{218}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 133rd Problem 2016
